Yoga for Men Only
by Frank R. Young
Prentice Hall | February 1970 | ISBN-10: 0139723986 | scanned PDF | 224 pages | 30 mb

Frank Young claims that the few simple, almost effortess exerciscs contained in this book can help to dramatically improve and rejivenate the physical and mental processes of any man-from 18 to 80. Qne of the few men trained in both Western chiropractic methods and Yoga lore, he documentS his program with actual case histories of men who have reached a new plateau in vitality, strength, ralzor-sharp mental processes and robust health!
